Name: Iteration Dashboard

DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: Team Effort
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[{"WidgetSubTitle":"Iteration effort per developer","WidgetType":"chart","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"#f0f0f0","WidgetFrameStyle":{},"WidgetXPosition":0,"WidgetYPosition":3,"WidgetRows":7,"WidgetColumns":28,"WidgetHeader":{"showContextInfo":false,"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"type":"year","visible":false},"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":false,"Metrics":[{"visible":true,"metricName":"? Forecast","metricFieldValue":"TimeGrandTotal"},{"visible":true,"metricName":"? Actual","metricFieldValue":"UtilizationPercentGrandTotal"}]},"showSubTitle":false,"showTitle":false},"WidgetDataSources":{"boards":{"type":"querytext","value":"select distinct w.[Name], 
		w.Oid, 
		ISNULL(w.Color, wst.Color) as color
	from WorkflowState w inner join [Document] d on w.[Document] = D.Oid
		inner join WorkflowStateType wst on w.WorkflowStateType = wst.Oid
	where w.GCRecord is null and d.GCRecord is null
			and d.Name = 'Deliverable'
			and ('00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000' in @workflowStateIds or w.Oid in @workflowStateIds)
			and w.Oid in ('700451ed-e58f-4cdb-abaa-4d0707fe4b16','5682701a-e88d-4bf4-bcba-5114c425aa9c','da28d50d-f2fa-4a93-9774-54520a131521','17a1c7f2-5a34-4ba9-a912-689f7db28e8d')
","mapping":{"id":"Oid","title":"Name","date":"endDate"}},"items":{"type":"querytext","value":"with briefs as (
select  dB.DocumentOid, dB.ActionsJson, ISJSON(dB.ActionsJson) as ValidJson, db.[Text], db.PlainText
		from DocumentBrief dB 
		where dB.DocumentTypeName = 'deliverable'
)
select D.Oid
       ,D.[Number] as JobNumber
	 ,D.[NameAndExternalId] as JobName
	, CONVERT(VARCHAR(6), D.AgreedDate, 6) as EndDate
	  ,U.Name as UserName
	  ,U.Oid as UserId
	  ,At.Name as AssignmentTypeName
        ,A.[Workload] as Workload
	,D.[WorkflowState] as WorkflowStateId
	,wst.Name as WorkflowStateName
	,isnull(w.Color, WST.Color) as WorkflowStateColor,
	SUBSTRING(B.PlainText, 1, 100) as Brief,
	(SELECT FORMATMESSAGE('http://localhost:30449/api/commercialclients/%s/imageStream', CONVERT(nvarchar(50), D.Client)) ) as ImageSrc

  from Deliverable D
	inner join Assignment A ON D.Oid = A.DocumentOid
	inner join WorkflowState W ON D.WorkflowState = W.Oid
	inner join  WorkflowStateType WST ON W.WorkflowStateType = WST.Oid
	inner join  AssignmentType AT ON A.AssignmentType = AT.Oid
	inner join [User] U on A.[User] = U.Oid
	left join briefs B on D.Oid = B.DocumentOid
	WHERE	AT.Name = 'Executor'
			and A.DocumentTypeName = 'Skill.Module.BusinessObjects.Deliverable'
			and A.[User] = @userId
			and ('00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000' in @workflowStateIds or D.WorkflowState in @workflowStateIds)
		--	and (d.EntryDateUtc between @startDate and @endDate or d.AgreedDateUtc between @startDate and @endDate or @startDate between d.EntryDateUtc and d.AgreedDateUtc)

","mapping":{"id":"Oid","title":"JobName","boardId":"WorkflowStateId","boardName":"WorkflowStateName","boardColor":"WorkflowStateColor","imageSrc":"ImageSrc","date":"EndDate","effort":"Workload","description":"Brief"}},"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"select  ssu.UserName as Developer,
        ssu.Oid as DeveloperId,
        sum(case when j.[State] = 'Scheduled for Development' and DATEPART(ww, cast(@FromDate as datetime)) = DATEPART(ww, duf.[Iteration Date]) then j.Effort else 0 end) as ScheduledEffort,
        sum(case when j.[State] = 'Under Development' and (duf.[Iteration Date] >= @FromDate and duf.[Iteration Date] < @ToDate) then j.Effort else 0 end) as UnderDeveplomentEffort,
        sum(case when j.[State] = 'Under Development' and (duf.[Iteration Date] >= (cast(@FromDate as datetime) - 7) and duf.[Iteration Date] < (cast(@ToDate as datetime) -7) ) then j.Effort else 0 end) as UnderDeveplomentEffortLastWeek,
        sum(case when j.[State] in ('In QA Tests', 'To Install', 'PM Tests', 'Request UAT', 'Request Approval') and DATEPART(ww, cast(@FromDate as datetime)) = DATEPART(ww, duf.[Iteration Date]) then j.Effort else 0 end) as DevelopedEffort
from    Analytics.DatamartJob j, Deliverable d left outer join Deliverable_UserFields duf on (duf.Oid = d.Oid), WorkflowState ws, WorkflowStateType wst, Department dep, Assignment ass,
        AssignmentType ast, [User] u, SecuritySystemUser ssu

where   ws.Oid = d.WorkflowState and
        wst.Oid = ws.WorkflowStateType and
        dep.Oid = j.DepartmentId and
        d.oid = j.oid and
        ass.DocumentOid = j.Oid and
        ass.AssignmentType = ast.Oid and
        ast.Name = 'Executor' and
        ass.[User] = u.Oid and
        u.Oid = ssu.Oid and
        u.Department in ('B0C2A44C-4BA9-4669-B0F0-3667956407CB', 'B05216A3-0B44-4BD8-87E5-3970E28A0D47', 'ff7a10a2-db3b-4c29-84a9-90e30d52691a') and
        (duf.[Iteration Date] >= (cast(@FromDate as datetime) - 8) and duf.[Iteration Date] < (cast(@ToDate as datetime)+2))

group by ssu.UserName, ssu.Oid","mapping":""}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{"RequiredFilters":["startDate","endDate"]}}]

[{"WidgetSubTitle":"Tickets not assigned","WidgetType":"chart","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"#f0f0f0","WidgetFrameStyle":{},"WidgetXPosition":28,"WidgetYPosition":3,"WidgetRows":7,"WidgetColumns":5,"WidgetHeader":{"showTitle":false,"showSubTitle":false,"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":false,"Metrics":[]},"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"visible":false,"type":"","startDate":null,"endDate":null}},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"select      count(*) as Total,
            sum(j.Effort) as Effort,
            'Unassigned' as Stage
from        Analytics.Job(@CurrentUserId) j, 
            SkillJob d, 
            WorkflowState ws, 
            WorkflowStateType wst, 
            Deliverable_UserFields duf,
            CommercialClient cc
where       cc.Oid = j.ClientId and
            d.Oid = j.Oid and 
            ws.Oid = d.WorkflowStateId and
            duf.Oid =j.Oid and
            wst.Oid = d.WorkflowStateTypeId and
            j.State in ('Scheduled for Development', 'Under Development') and
            not exists
            (select ass.Oid from Assignment ass, AssignmentType ast, [User] u, SecuritySystemUser ssu where 
               ass.DocumentOid = j.Oid and ast.Name = 'Executor' and ass.AssignmentType = ast.Oid and ass.[User] = u.Oid and
            u.Oid = ssu.Oid and
            u.Department in ('B0C2A44C-4BA9-4669-B0F0-3667956407CB', 'B05216A3-0B44-4BD8-87E5-3970E28A0D47', 'ff7a10a2-db3b-4c29-84a9-90e30d52691a')) and
            duf.[Iteration Date] >= @FromDate and duf.[Iteration Date] < @ToDate","mapping":""}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{"PreviousPeriod":{"Show":false,"KeyFieldName":"","Type":0},"RequiredFilters":["startDate","endDate"]}}]

DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: Tickets by Client
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[{"WidgetSubTitle":"Tickets under development","WidgetType":"chart","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"#f0f0f0","WidgetFrameStyle":{},"WidgetXPosition":33,"WidgetYPosition":3,"WidgetRows":7,"WidgetColumns":15,"WidgetHeader":{"showContextInfo":false,"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"type":"year","visible":false},"showSubTitle":false,"showTitle":false},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"select      j.[Client] as ClientCode, 
            case 
                    when j.[ClientCode] != '' then j.[ClientCode]
                     else 'NoCode'
            end as Client,
            sum(j.Effort) as TotalEffort,
            count(*) as TotalTickets
from        Analytics.DatamartJob j, 
            SkillJob d, 
            WorkflowState ws, 
            WorkflowStateType wst, 
            Deliverable_UserFields duf,
            CommercialClient cc
where       cc.Oid = j.ClientId and
            d.Oid = j.Oid and 
            ws.Oid = d.WorkflowStateId and
            duf.Oid = j.Oid and
            wst.Oid = d.WorkflowStateTypeId and
            j.[ClientCode] != 'SKILLS' and
            duf.[Iteration Date] >= @FromDate and duf.[Iteration Date] < @ToDate
group by    j.[Client], j.[ClientCode]","mapping":""}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{"RequiredFilters":["startDate","endDate"]}}]

DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: Month
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[{"WidgetSubTitle":"Closed and In Progress Tickets","WidgetType":"rangeselector","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"#e0e0e0","WidgetFrameStyle":{},"WidgetXPosition":0,"WidgetYPosition":0,"WidgetRows":3,"WidgetColumns":48,"WidgetHeader":{"showContextInfo":false,"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"startDate":"2019/11/01","endDate":"2019/12/30","type":"year","visible":false},"showSubTitle":false,"showTitle":false},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"SELECT  DATEPART(year, duf.[Iteration Date]) as Year,
        DATEPART(week, duf.[Iteration Date]) as [Week],
        Min(duf.[Iteration Date]) as WeekStart,
        sum(case when j.[State] in ('In QA Tests', 'To Install', 'PM Tests', 'Request UAT', 'Request Approval', 'Closed') then j.Effort else 0 end) as DoneEffort,
        sum(case when j.[State] in ('Under Development', 'Scheduled for Development') then j.Effort else 0 end) as ToBeDevelopedEffort
FROM    Analytics.DatamartJob j 
        left outer join Deliverable_UserFields duf on (duf.Oid = j.Oid)
        and duf.[Iteration Date] is not null
GROUP BY DATEPART(year, duf.[Iteration Date]),
        DATEPART(week, duf.[Iteration Date])","mapping":""}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":null}]

DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: Tickets for iteration
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[{"WidgetSubTitle":"Tickets requested to be developed","WidgetType":"grid","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"","WidgetFrameStyle":{},"WidgetXPosition":0,"WidgetYPosition":10,"WidgetRows":26,"WidgetColumns":48,"WidgetHeader":{"showContextInfo":false,"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"type":"year","visible":false},"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":false,"Metrics":[{"visible":true,"metricName":"# Delayed Under Development","metricFieldValue":"DelayedUnderDevelopmentJobsGrandTotal"}]},"showSubTitle":false,"showTitle":false},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"select      j.Oid,
            j.[State] as Stage,
            j.NameAndExternalId as Job,
            j.[Date] as EndDate,
            d.effort,
            duf.[Work Item] as WorkItem,
            duf.Iteration as Iteration,
            '' as IterationNo,
            duf.[Iteration Date] as IterationDate,
            isnull(ws.Color, wst.Color) as Color,
            datediff(day, getdate(), j.[Date]) as Days,
            (select STRING_AGG(convert(nvarchar(50), ass.[User]), ',') from Assignment ass, AssignmentType ast, [User] u, SecuritySystemUser ssu where 
               ass.DocumentOid = j.Oid and ast.Name = 'Executor' and ass.AssignmentType = ast.Oid and ass.[User] = u.Oid and
            u.Oid = ssu.Oid and
            u.Department in ('B0C2A44C-4BA9-4669-B0F0-3667956407CB','B05216A3-0B44-4BD8-87E5-3970E28A0D47','ff7a10a2-db3b-4c29-84a9-90e30d52691a')) as ExecutorId,
            (select STRING_AGG(convert(nvarchar(50), u.[Name]), ',') from Assignment ass, AssignmentType ast, [User] u, SecuritySystemUser ssu where 
               ass.DocumentOid = j.Oid and ast.Name = 'Executor' and ass.AssignmentType = ast.Oid and ass.[User] = u.Oid and
            u.Oid = ssu.Oid and
            u.Department in ('B0C2A44C-4BA9-4669-B0F0-3667956407CB','B05216A3-0B44-4BD8-87E5-3970E28A0D47','ff7a10a2-db3b-4c29-84a9-90e30d52691a')) as ExecutorName,
            (select STRING_AGG(convert(nvarchar(50), u.[HasImage]), ',') from Assignment ass, AssignmentType ast, [User] u, SecuritySystemUser ssu where 
               ass.DocumentOid = j.Oid and ast.Name = 'Executor' and ass.AssignmentType = ast.Oid and ass.[User] = u.Oid and
            u.Oid = ssu.Oid and
            u.Department in ('B0C2A44C-4BA9-4669-B0F0-3667956407CB','B05216A3-0B44-4BD8-87E5-3970E28A0D47','ff7a10a2-db3b-4c29-84a9-90e30d52691a')) as HasImage,
            j.Client as ClientName,
            j.ClientId,
            cc.HasImage as ClientHasImage,
            duf.[Work Item] as WorkItem
from        Analytics.DatamartJob j, 
            SkillJob d, 
            WorkflowState ws, 
            WorkflowStateType wst, 
            Deliverable_UserFields duf,
            CommercialClient cc
where       cc.Oid = j.ClientId and
            d.Oid = j.Oid and 
            ws.Oid = d.WorkflowStateId and
            duf.Oid = j.Oid and
            wst.Oid = d.WorkflowStateTypeId and
            j.State in ('Under Development', 'Scheduled for Development', 'In QA Tests', 'PM Tests', 'To Install', 'Move to production','Request Approval','Request more information','Request UAT','Done') 
            and  duf.[Iteration Date] >= @FromDate and duf.[Iteration Date] < @ToDate","mapping":""}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{"RequiredFilters":["startDate","endDate"]}}]
